Name: 三国时代2
About the game: The goal of the game is to occupy all the territories through battle. There are a lot of interesting things in the game, such as you can enhance the hero's fighting power by buying equipment, you can sneak into enemy territory to steal the enemy's hero, you can get married to create a new hero, you can also resurrect the dead hero. I hope you will like this game.
